messages.content: every culture must have a dumpling, can you pick iraq france and make a long list of diverse cultures that have something similar to dumplings tibettean thailand etc

This list could be expanded further with regional twists (e.g., Afghan *aushak*, Uzbek *chuchvara*, South African *vetkoek*, etc.), but it already shows how widespread and beloved dumpling-like foods are.
